name: .NKSC File Extension
summary: Learn about .NKSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: NKSC files are not meant to be opened manually. When you open an NEF or NRW image that you've edited in Nikon Capture NX-D, Capture NX-D automatically applies any edits saved in an associated NKSC file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
